response.overview: A live-action adaptation of the video game Snoot Game, Set in a world where dinosaurs didn't go extinct and evolved into anthropomorphic dino people alongside humans. Troubled and pessimistic high schooler Anon Carter moves into the city of Volcadera Bluffs alone. His plans to stay to himself are thrown asunder when he encounters Fang, a rebellious, hot-headed pterodactyl girl who will drastically change his life.
response.title: Volcaldera
